name: The Coming of the Great Colorful Handkerchief 2.0
name_original: The Coming of the Great Colorful Handkerchief 2.0
description:
This socio-critical game was created for the Ludum Dare 42 in under 72 hours. It's about the myth of the Great White Handkerchief as we know it from the Book "Hitchhickers Guide to the Galaxy" by Douglas Adams.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/the-coming-of-the-great-colorful-handkerc...

//Creators:

 theSaltyOne Daniel Eisele = new theSaltyOne();
bevac Anton Feil = new bevac();
Petman02 Peter Heidekorn = new Petman02();
mosaic Lennart Mannteuffel = new mosaic();

A very long time ago - I mean a very very long time - what is known to the people on Viltvodle VI as the GREAT GREEN ARKLESEIZURE sneezed out the entire universe.

These people lived in fear of a time they called 'The Coming of the Great White Handkerchief'.

But they were wrong in this point.

They should have been afraid of something else.

The GREAT COLORFUL HANDKERCHIEF is penetrating from another universe to ours.

To be honest: Nobody really knows what would happen if it succeded. But it would be bad. Probably.

We built a core to prevent this.

Now you come in.

You protect the core.

We made it possible for you to buy new parts for your ship in the pause menu. Please buy a lot. We don't have much money left :(.

Prevent our universe as we know it from getting whiped out! Or getting too colorful! Or whatever.

NOW is the time of ...

THE COMING OF THE GREAT COLORFUL HANDKERCHIEF

At some point, the Great Colorful Handkerchief will come. 

The Question is just nehw.
